mapper.select: SELECT noticeidx, companyname, noticejobcode, noticeregdate, noticeperiod FROM noticeinfo WHERE noticeidx > 1090 ORDER BY noticeidx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeinfo ( userid, companyname, noticejobcode, noticeemp, noticewagemode, noticewage, noticejoinmode, noticecareer, noticeedu, companyaddress, noticeregdate, noticeperiod, noticejob, businessboss, businessmember, businesscode) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{companyname}, #{noticejobcode}, #{noticeemp}, #{noticewagemode}, #{noticewage}, #{noticejoinmode}, #{noticecareer}, #{noticeedu}, #{companyaddress}, #{noticeregdate}, #{noticeperiod} , '', #{businessboss}, #{businessmember} , #{businesscode} )
